metadata.description: # My JSFX Repository A collection of my Reaper JSFX plugins.

A low footprint saturator for drums. It has 4x oversampling(immediate effect unlike the build in reaper oversamplign which needs stop/start of playback), auto gain (peak defined, so there is a short latency every time you change the gain) and 4 different types fo saturation. It also has bass protect (hi pass) and low pass.
Same as DrumSat but extended with a presence filter and a Iron Transformer (Neve style) slider. Try values between 40-60 which will fit most instruments.

Same as DrumSat_TX but extended with a M/S or Width slider. Useful when putting a lof of saturation on a channel as this tends to make the signal more MID oriented, so the stereo persepctive suffers. Adjusting it to 105-110 usually fixes this.
